name: Shooty-Shooty Doggy Fun Park
description:
Ever wish you could just collect dogs in a safe environment and know your dogs are safe? T-Dog's got you covered, babe.

It's time to collect some dogs! W, A, S, D to move, right-click to collect dogs, left click to shoot them out. Use the mouse scroll to go through your inventory.  It's your time, this is your area. 

Go up to signs, they'll tell you what you need to know! Press ESC to quit the game. 

This game was originally done for an assignment and is completely based on the game 'Slime Rancher' by Monomi Park, go check out the game here:  http://www.slimerancher.com/

Music Used:

  •  Quirky Dog by Kevin MacLeod
  • The Show Must Be Go by Kevin MacLeod
